name: Somebody, Somewhere, Somehow, Something
description:
A Game by Zac North for Authentic Experiences, Inc.

With Music by Josiah Nethery

You enter the hotel...but what leaves?

This game was intended to be procedurally generated, but that aspect of it has not yet been complete.

Although it has dialogue and story, it lacks the scripting and engine code to bring them into the game, but I will add some of dialogue and story this week even if I can't add the procedural generation yet.
